solution_line_template: Micah drank {morning_water_liters} x {afternoon_multiplier} = <<{morning_water_liters}*{afternoon_multiplier}={afternoon_water_liters}>>{afternoon_water_liters} liters in the afternoon.
She drank a total of {morning_water_liters} + {afternoon_water_liters} = <<{morning_water_liters}+{afternoon_water_liters}={total_water_liters}>>{total_water_liters} liters of water.
